title: sourdough config
description: a sourdough 'starter' configuration file for specifying project dependencies, commands to run, and files to be removed when scaffolding a new project

prod.description: list of composer packages to install for production

dev.description: list of composer packages to install for development

remove.description: list of composer packages to remove when scaffolding a new project

prod.description: list of npm packages to install for production

dev.description: list of npm packages to install for development

remove.description: list of npm packages to remove when scaffolding a new project

repos.title: composer repositories
repos.description: list of composer repositories to install before scaffolding a new project

artisan.title: artisan commands
artisan.description: list of artisan commands to run when scaffolding a new project

npx.title: npx commands
npx.description: list of npx commands to run when scaffolding a new project

commands.title: custom commands
commands.description: list of user defined commands to run when scaffolding is complete - whitelisted: npm, npx, php, composer, git, and anything in the /vendor or /node_modules folder(s)

remove_files.title: files to remove
remove_files.description: list of default files to remove when scaffolding a new project - e.g /resources/views/welcome.blade.php
